TopicTitle: A Tribute to an almost forgotten Youtuber - Pixelstache

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody,

Pixelstache is/was one of the Youtubers that brought my Attention to Kerbal Space Program.

Anyways, the Guy has not uploaded any Videos for 3-4 Months but i loved his designs.

So I give him a Tribute on my Twitch-Channel

Stache, if you are Still around.. this is for you!

http://www.twitch.tv/malfunctionm1ke/c/3874695

Original:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j4EZ_gxnfWo
this made me want to go to duna agian! it's been long since i've had a real goal in the game, so thanks for the vid Stache

Hey, does anyone know what his old channel was? I used to have it, but I can't remember anymore. I loved his vids. I wish he was still active.

And sorry about reviving a long-dead post.

PixelStache was also known as StompThompson.

Thats all I figured out. Seems like he is out of business

Channel is private, videos are private, oh well.

Actually, I think I remember watching this guy's videos back in the day. It's sad to see good youtubers gone (Macey Dean comes to mind. )
